resources.string: Introduction: In a nearby galaxy, stars\' fate hinges on the battle against evil forces. The Galactic Republic, with valiant Jedi, fights for three years against the malevolent Dooku. Just when victory seems close, a new menace emerges – a pervasive wave of darkness engulfing the galaxy. Can new heroes rise to preserve the stellar light and defeat the encroaching shadows?

•Title: Galaxy Fighter 
•Director: Alex Starlight
•Genre: Sci-Fi/Fantasy
•Lead Actor: Ethan Nova
You must select at least one card

The first Android app that showcases the best movie worth watching. On the poster button, you can get a first impression of the movie (intro). If you watch and enjoy it, you can hit the like button. If you want to continue watching later, you can press 'wishlist' and share it with friends, family, or enjoy some quality time alone.

On the 'purchase ticket' button, you can buy tickets (note that student tickets will be verified at the cinema entrance). You can check your order number and the chosen cinema in the 'purchase history' button.

For any additional questions, feel free to contact us on Facebook at CineMate. Enjoy!"
(Click on the image to view more images)
